amendment.description: Amendment sought to subject appropriations bills to the provisions requiring CBO cost estimates of legislation containing Federal mandates.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to subject appropriations bills to the provisions of the bill requiring CBO cost estimates of legislation containing federal mandates. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 32 in the Congressional Record of January 19, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beilenson amendment (A056) Failed by voice vote.
